segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see this kitchen on the verge of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spilling everywhere, it could ruin so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, she might slip and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balancing on that stool looks so vulnerable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One tip and he'll crash down painfully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, full of hope for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's all secretive, no guidance from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside contrasts with this impending sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes waiting to be broken, water damage looming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This lack of awareness is truly poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR
